summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganbareMinerals Dewy Lip Gloss-Balm is a clean, vegan lip balm that nourishes lips with all-day juicy shine* + 24 hr hydration** for lips that are visibly healthier, smoother and softer.
details: DetailsBenefitsHybrid lip gloss-balm nourishes lips with sheer, even color in just one swipe - available in 8 inclusive shadesClinically proven to deliver 8 hour continuous shine*‚ÄãClinically proven to deliver 24 hours of continuous hydration*‚ÄãLips look softer, smoother, healthier in just one week**94% lip-loving ingredients, clean, vegan‚ÄãCurbside recyclable, all aluminum packaging ‚ÄãCruelty-freeVeganClean - gluten-free + formulated without synthetic fragrance, PEGs and moreKey IngredientsSea Buckthorn Oil: keeps lips feeling nourished and moisturized, never sticky‚ÄãSesame Seed Extract: help increase volume and moisture retention for smoother lips‚ÄãResearch ResultsAll-day juicy shine*+ 24 hr hydration**Lips look softer, smoother, healthier in just one week***Based on a clinical test of 34 people ‚Äã**Based on a consumer test of 34 people ‚ÄãItem 2623847How To UseApply Dewy Lip Gloss-Balm to the lips for a sheer wash of hydrating color.Pair with MINERALIST Lasting Lip Liner to create definition to the lips or a slightly fuller lip look.Layer MINERALIST Lip Gloss-Balm over top for added shine.IngredientsOctyldodecanol, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Polyglyceryl- 6 Polyricinoleate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax (Euphorbia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Candelilla), Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Synthetic Wax, Dicalcium Phosphate Dihydrate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Fragrance (Parfum), Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Extract, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Tocopherol, Linalool. +/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir) Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 28 Lake, Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Titanium Dioxide.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Dewy Lip Gloss-Balm to the lips for a sheer wash of hydrating color.Pair with MINERALIST Lasting Lip Liner to create definition to the lips or a slightly fuller lip look.Layer MINERALIST Lip Gloss-Balm over top for added shine.
ingredients: Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax (Euphorbia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Candelilla)

reviews.headline: Holy grail red.
reviews.comments:
This honestly is the best red for a natural looking red.
Plus,  it's SO NURISHING!
I WILL be stocking up.
I have no idea wheat the other reviews are taking about,  it being dry or not long lasting.
Of course it's more a balm so it will need to be reapplied.
But not nearly as often as a non sticky gloss.
 This is the gem if lip balms! üíã

reviews.headline: Dry and color doesn't last
reviews.comments: This looked dry on my lips.   It was NOT a dewy lip gloss or balm.  The color barely lasted an hour.  The color "Affection" is supposed to be rosy pink, but it looked orange on my lips.

reviews.headline: Surprising Find
reviews.comments: I was in the store looking casually and saw this. I was pleasantly surprised. This balm is very reminiscent of k/c beauty products. Its glossy but not sticky and has a nice tint to it but is not opaque. Because of the texture is doesn't last when eating and drinking but that's to be expected. The shades will work on all skin tones because they don't have a white base so theu wont look ashy on dark skin tones

reviews.headline: My favorite lip gloss/balm iv ever used
reviews.comments: Iv tried many lippies but this one beats them all i get the color dream it makes my lips feel amazing its so moisturizing sp glossy snd shiny the color is a sheer beautiful light pink makes my lips look and feel do hydrayed and plump even tho its not a plumping gloss it does better than most others iv tried. If your thinking of trying it im telling you do it you wont regret it for a second

reviews.headline: New favorite balm
reviews.comments: This balm is more like a lightweight lipstick because it has more coverage than the average balm. It makes your lips feel silky smooth after application. I have Grateful and love this color for everyday use.

reviews.headline: No Color At All
reviews.comments: While I like how this feels on my lips, I would not call Dream any kind of pink.  It's pretty clear and not at all the color photographed.  Very disappointed, but will keep it because I used it.  The picture I posted is the exact color.  Not pink.

reviews.headline: Love, love, LOVE!!!!!
reviews.comments: I absolutely LOVE this new lip balm in the shade 'DREAM'. Its super moisturizing but NOT at all sticky! Just the slightest hint of pink - my new go-to lip balm when i want the perfect 'nude' lip.

reviews.headline: Love the Gloss-Balms!
reviews.comments: The Gloss-Balms ate very pretty, moisturizing and comfortable to wear.  For a glossy product it lasts a decent amount of time.  I have several shades and enjoy them all!!

reviews.headline: Ballet pink isn't pink
reviews.comments: Thr ballet pink is a nude pale orange yellow. There is zero pink in this product. It also doesnt look like you put anything on. Moisturing is fine, but if you want color look elsewhere.

faceoff_positive.comments:
**Review:**

Thanks to BareMinerals for the free Dewy Lip Gloss-Balm in shade Soul!

BareMinerals' Dewy Lip Gloss-Balm in shade Soul is a delightful addition to any makeup collection. As someone who's tried various lip products, this one stands out for its unique combination of hydration and shine. The mauve hue of Soul adds a touch of elegance to any look, perfect for both daytime wear and evening outings.

One of the standout benefits of this product is its 24-hour hydration, making it ideal for those with dry lips or anyone looking for long-lasting moisture. The formula feels lightweight and comfortable, never sticky or heavy, which is a huge plus for everyday wear. Additionally, the sheer color payoff with just one swipe ensures effortless application and a natural finish.

Comparing it to other lip glosses and balms I've tried, BareMinerals' Dewy Lip Gloss-Balm truly stands out for its hydrating properties and the beautiful sheen it imparts. It strikes the perfect balance between a balm's nourishing qualities and a gloss's lustrous shine.

As for whether I would buy this product, absolutely! Its versatility and quality make it a worthwhile investment for anyone in need of a reliable lip product.

I wholeheartedly recommend BareMinerals' Dewy Lip Gloss-Balm in shade Soul to friends and family who appreciate a hydrating lip product with a touch of color and shine. It's a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their lip game while keeping their pout moisturized and beautiful throughout the day.

Overall, BareMinerals' Dewy Lip Gloss-Balm in shade Soul exceeds expectations, delivering on its promises of hydration, shine, and effortless beauty.
faceoff_positive.headline: A Hydrating Delight with BareMinerals Dewy Lip

faceoff_negative.comments: I like Bare Minerals and have used their lip products in the past so I was excited to try their new Dewy Lipgloss Balm. The little lipgloss tube is so cute! I love how you can twist up the amount of product you need. I did receive a sample size so I hope they do the same for the full size. It applied well. I got the color "Dream" which is a super light pink on the label on the box but in the bullet and on my lips it's looked clear. It did leave a dewy wet look which was cute. I also tried it on a lipstick to see what it would look like and it just made my lips dewy. No scent at all. The flavor was basic lipgloss kinda chemical flavored. I found that odd because I look at Bare Minerals as a clean brand. As for wear‚Ä¶.it lasted maybe 20 minutes on my lips after basic talking and no hydration at all, which I think would happen with a lip balm. Definitely a bummer! All in all for the price point I'm sure these are, there are plenty of other options out there.
faceoff_negative.headline: Really wanted to love but‚Ä¶
